channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Freezing temperatures reveal holes in NYC's attention to the homeless
item.description: New York City has seen a troubling number of deaths during the current cold spell. Mayor Zohran Mamdani says he'll fix what some see as poor communication with city workers who assist the homeless.
item.content:encoded: New York City has seen a troubling number of deaths during the current cold spell. Mayor Zohran Mamdani says he'll fix what some see as poor communication with city workers who assist the homeless.
item.dc:creator: Liz Kim

item.title: Hate them or not, Patriots fans want the glory back in Super Bowl LX
item.description: As Bostonians bemoan their long years of suffering without a Super Bowl win, rival fans gripe that Title Town has become Entitled Town.
item.content:encoded:
As Bostonians bemoan their long years of suffering without a Super Bowl win, rival fans gripe that Title Town has become Entitled Town.

(Image credit: Elizabeth Johnson)
item.dc:creator: Tovia Smith

item.title: It's about to get easier for Trump to fire federal workers
item.description: Since his first term, President Trump has wanted to be able to fire federal employees for any reason. A new rule vastly expands his authority to do that.
item.content:encoded:
Since his first term, President Trump has wanted to be able to fire federal employees for any reason. A new rule vastly expands his authority to do that.

(Image credit: Mandel Ngan)
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hsu

item.title: U.S., Iran to hold nuclear program talks. And, Dems unveil new list of DHS demands
item.description: The U.S. and Iran begin high-stakes talks today over Iran's nuclear program. And, Democrats unveil a detailed list of demands to change how DHS immigration enforcement officers operate.
item.content:encoded:
The U.S. and Iran begin high-stakes talks today over Iran's nuclear program. And, Democrats unveil a detailed list of demands to change how DHS immigration enforcement officers operate.

(Image credit: AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Court records: Chicago immigration raid was about squatters, not Venezuelan gangs
item.description: In the documents, Homeland Security said the raid "was based on intelligence that there were illegal aliens unlawfully occupying apartments." There is no mention of criminal gangs or Tren de Aragua.
item.content:encoded:
In the documents, Homeland Security said the raid "was based on intelligence that there were illegal aliens unlawfully occupying apartments." There is no mention of criminal gangs or Tren de Aragua.

(Image credit: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán)
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: What does the CIA not want you to know? The quiz has the secret
item.description: Plus: ambiguous mascots, rodents with hard-to-spell names, and three boring photos of buildings.
item.content:encoded: Plus: ambiguous mascots, rodents with hard-to-spell names, and three boring photos of buildings.
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Minneapolis now has daily deportation flights. One man has been documenting them
item.description: A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends immigration detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.
item.content:encoded:
A professional airplane enthusiast has been tracking the federally chartered deportation flights out of the Minneapolis airport as DHS sends immigration detainees to other states and, eventually, other countries.

(Image credit: Jaida Grey Eagle for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Kat Lonsdorf

item.title: DOJ admits redaction errors in Epstein docs while names in files face scrutiny
item.description: The Justice Department's latest release of files related to Jeffrey Epstein files has led to new scrutiny of powerful people in convicted sex offender's orbit.
item.content:encoded:
The Justice Department's latest release of files related to Jeffrey Epstein files has led to new scrutiny of powerful people in convicted sex offender's orbit.

(Image credit: Mariam Zuhaib)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman

item.title: White House holds up funding for $16B transportation project in New York
item.description: A $16 billion transportation project in New York is in jeopardy unless the Trump administration relents. The Gateway project is building a new commuter rail tunnel between New York and New Jersey.
item.content:encoded: A $16 billion transportation project in New York is in jeopardy unless the Trump administration relents. The Gateway project is building a new commuter rail tunnel between New York and New Jersey.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Nessen

item.title: Investigators examining ransom notes sent during search for Nancy Guthrie
item.description: The FBI says it's examining ransom notes sent to the media as the search for Nancy Guthrie, the mother of 'Today' show host Savannah Guthrie, enters its sixth day.
item.content:encoded: The FBI says it's examining ransom notes sent to the media as the search for Nancy Guthrie, the mother of 'Today' show host Savannah Guthrie, enters its sixth day.
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise
